website_summaries.verdict: Great 2-piece set does a number of kitchen tasks well, from bench scraping to vegetable chopping. Handy conversion table is printed on the scratch-free silicone bowl scraper.
pros: Blade is very sharp, excellent for vegetable chopping
Measuring guide useful for recipe conversions
Set includes a silicone bowl scraper
cons: Handle is longer than blade, and can become loose over time

customer_reviews.title: Best little kitchen tool you didn't know you needed.
customer_reviews.text: Sweet little pastry scraper with a little fun-facts-to-know-and-tell bowl scraper. You'll also receive a short and sweet pdf to help you get the most out of your scrapers. The pdf also includes a recipe that appears rather enticing. The pastry scraper is a very versatile tool - and easy to clean - so I find myself using it so much it hardly sees the inside of a drawer. Another good thing about this scraper, in particular, is the company Spring Chef provides a very personal, a very human touch to its service. Quite a refreshing experience.
customer_reviews.author: eimcmullin

customer_reviews.title: Great Products - Highly Recommend!
customer_reviews.text: During a recent move my old bench scraper was lost. I found the Spring Chef pastry scraper / bench scraper on Amazon and hoped that it would be an acceptable replacement. To my delight, it's far better than the items I lost. The pastry scraper fits my hand perfectly and comfortably. Gathering dough now is a quick, easy job. And the bench scraper is fantastic - not only does it comfortably fit my arthritic hand with no discomfort whatsoever but it does an fabulous job cleaning the work space. I'm thrilled with both products, so much so that I've recommend them to friends - something I rarely do unless the product is really outstanding. These are!
customer_reviews.author: Carol M-W

customer_reviews.title: Really handy tools to have in the kitchen
customer_reviews.text: I bought these because the Croissant class from Craftsy said I should have them. I didn't use them that much, but was surprised at how helpful having the scraper is and bowl scraper are. I have used other tools to do the same job, but these tools make it much easier and cleaner. The more I use them, the more I am becoming dependent on them!
customer_reviews.author: K. Mater

customer_reviews.title: An essential kitchen tool for any baker.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this steel pastry scraper to replace a nearly worn out plastic scraper. I gave it an informal test today while making some mixed fruit breakfast pastries using thawed, packaged and rolled out ready to fill puff pastry. The plastic scraper clung to the dough and left part of it on the underlying parchment paper. The Spring Chef scraper lifted both dough and oven ready filled pastries without tearing or leaving dough traces behind. I had used it to cut the sheets of puff pastry after rolling and before filling. This utensil cleaned up easily and worked beautifully. It would be great for all kinds of dough and I am very well pleased with my inexpensive purchase. Bravo!
customer_reviews.author: Kentucky Quacker

customer_reviews.title: If you aren't bench scraping, you aren't living.
customer_reviews.text: What on earth did I do before I had this tool? Pick up chopped vegetables with my hands? Like an animal? Use my knife like a savage? This is so good at so many things. It could only be better if it also had wine in it. And the bowl scraper? I didn't even think I needed this and I used it three times (twice for scraping and once for the handy conversion chart) first thing out of the box. It's magic. Got a full extra cupcake out of my mixing bowl after I thought it was "empty!"
customer_reviews.author: SueK

customer_reviews.title: A tool every kitchen needs
customer_reviews.text: This scraper is perfect. How did I ever get along without it?? I plan to get one for my daughter and grand-daughter. I want to share how my quest for this kitchen tool came about. Once a week our Denver Post features a section re: recipes, kitchen needs etc. There was an article entitled "Five Tools Every Kitchen Should Have". (Interesting how this caught my eye since I am 76 and have spent great periods of time in the kitchen.) and the pastry cutter/bench chopper was was one of the five listed. Many thanks for this wonderful Mom's day additional gift for Nana. Mimi
customer_reviews.author: Mimi

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this to help form tight sourdough rounds. As u can see it was made nice and tight and gave a great spring to the finished loaf. It will be great to lift cut veggies to the pan . Product seems heavy duty and the bowl scraper is an added bonus. Easy to clean, glad I didn’t buy one with a wooden handle.
customer_reviews.author: Suzste

customer_reviews.title: So versatile
customer_reviews.text: I use this thing almost every day. I used to bake almost every day, mostly breads, as a hobby and initially bought it for that purpose and it worked great. I've since given up baking (because it's really fattening, haha) but I find I still use it all the time. It works great to transfer my chopped veggies from the cutting board to the pan. it's really easy to clean by hand or just put it in the top rack of the dishwasher. It's holding up extremely well to almost daily use. I'm glad I bought this.
customer_reviews.author: Becca

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Although I don't use this bench scraper for its intended purpose, it is perfect for what I do use it for. I use it to cut portions from blocks of cheese so that I can snack on those portions throughout the week. The scraper cuts through the cheese like butter, and the ruler engraved at the base of the "blade" allows me to cut equal pieces. This thing is perfect. Thank you very much.
customer_reviews.author: Alex I.

customer_reviews.title: and in excellent condition. Was a Christmas Gift for my sister-in-law
customer_reviews.text: Quality product, delivered ON TIME, and in excellent condition. Was a Christmas Gift for my sister-in-law, she asked for tips and a good pastry scraper, I knew this was the product for me. Excellent communication with the staff of Spring Chef, they followed up with me to be SURE the product was as advertised and we were happy with the product. That type of service, and commitment is far and few between these days. 5 stars, thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Phil Gregg

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed
customer_reviews.text: The metal scraper has a sharpened edge that works well for scraping my cutting board but this thing really chops veggies and cooked chicken fast. I gave the edge a little touch up and now I have a very efficient cutter to boot. The bowl scraper is very handy. Performs well and has a quick reference table for measurements.
customer_reviews.author: Karl Williams

customer_reviews.title: Works well, part of my sourdough initiative
customer_reviews.text: Trying to work with higher hydration dough, both the scraper and the chopper are helpful for not getting sticky jazz hands. If I have to keep flouring my hands it sorta brings down the hydration so by using the scrapers to mix and fold the dough you don't have to get it all over your hands. Just like all those youtube videos.
customer_reviews.author: William Parish

customer_reviews.title: Great scrapers!
customer_reviews.text: Super pleased with this set! I’m a novice to sourdough bread and have found these to help a lot. I love the bowl scraper for keeping my bowl tidy after mixing and during stretch/fold if needed... and the bench scraper is perfect for shaping my loaves. I can’t speak to longevity of the set as I just got them but I think this was a great value and addition to my kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Eileen K.

customer_reviews.title: Very sharp and handy
customer_reviews.text: Where do I begin? This bench cutter is now my main prep tool. It chops, enabling you to scrap and put in containers. It is quick and efficient. The dough scrapper makes emptying out ingredients flawless from pastry to meatballs. It appears to be very sturdy and easy to clean. Very satisfied with these tools.
customer_reviews.author: Judith dickens

customer_reviews.title: A "must have" kitchen tool
customer_reviews.text: The perfect scraper is a must for pastry making, pizza dough or any preparation involving sticky material. This little tool is an ideal size with a perfect handle that fits nicely into the hand and it has a sharp knife-like blade which is a must. It's sturdy and well crafted and it's the missing tool you never quite realized you needed.
customer_reviews.author: Cliff

customer_reviews.title: A great kitchen tool....
customer_reviews.text: I’ma guy & I like my tools! A kitchen is no different than a garage. When I’m creating a meal, I need tools. Now, this stainless steel scraper is always out next to my cutting board. The conversion chart is also genius, everything you need. Mahalo Spring Chef.
customer_reviews.author: E-man

customer_reviews.title: Great kitchen tool for All kitchens.
customer_reviews.text: Hi Brian, Thank you for your emails. I purchased this product because I had used a product like this before with my daughter making scones and other foods. I liked hers very much & decided to purchase a chopper. As I was searching thru Amazon I decided upon your product for two reasons. One was the quality, then how other consumers rated your product next because of the slightly tear drop shape scraper with the measurements. My husband & I cook together. We are always asking each other how many of this is in this. Now we have your product in our kitchen to assist us with how many cups in a pound etc.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to the kitchen.
customer_reviews.text: This bench scrapper was a great addition to my kitchen. It's sturdy, easy to clean, and offers a good grip. FYI, it's good to use a bench scrapper when picking up chopped ingredients because it has good surface area, and it helps keep your knives sharp by avoiding unnecessary wear in the edge of your blade.
customer_reviews.author: Eduardo H

customer_reviews.title: Inferior product that arrives sticky and scratches easily
customer_reviews.text: When this product arrives, you get the pleasure of scrubbing off a stubborn sticky residue after removing the blue tape that protects the blade. This would be a minor annoyance if the product wasn't made of stainless steel, which means using even a simple kitchen sponge to remove the sticky residue will scratch it (see pictures). So, you can't sponge clean it, and you can't put it in the dishwasher... It will still fulfill its intended purpose, but at a great convenience cost.
customer_reviews.author: meddlesome

customer_reviews.title: absolute junk
customer_reviews.text: product looks and feels cheap. plastic two piece handle will not last. FREE bowl scraper is cheap. soft plastic covering metal is torn out of the box. wish to return it! not even worth the inexpensive price! I rate it as ZERO stars. but your rating requires at least one.
customer_reviews.author: Clint Breeze

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Cutter for SOAP makers!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this cutter! I use it for cutting SOAP. It is solid and sturdy, not flimsy. It is taller than most soap cutters so is great for bars that have decorative tops or frosted piping on top. The width of the Blade is 6 inches, and the Height of the BLADE below the handle is 4 and 1/8 inches. It has a bevel on the front side of the blade so is sharper than most soap cutters, makes a nice clean cut. I would recommend this for soap makers. I also love the included silicon bowl scraper. It conforms to the shape of the bowl and quickly removes the remaining soap.
customer_reviews.author: Star Spangled Bling

customer_reviews.title: Nice and well made
customer_reviews.text: I used it to make pizza dough, it works very well for cutting the dough into smaller portions, and for scraping the dough off the counter, when you are done. The little round scraper works well for getting the last of the batter out of a bowl.
customer_reviews.author: deborah l. bien

customer_reviews.title: Easier Sourdough Making
customer_reviews.text: These products do the job and make sourdough baking so much easier and quicker. Cleaner and more accurate than using our hands. Last time we made 8 loaves- two each white herbed (from the garden), raisin, seeded and kalamala olive.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn Circe

customer_reviews.title: Love these little goodies
customer_reviews.text: I bake a lot of bread and the scraper is great for dividing the dough when making more than one loaf at a time. I use it to scrape up left over flower or dough stuck to the counter when cleaning up. Some of my doughs are a bit sticky, especially baguette, and this makes it great to divide and clean up. The small black scraper is great for getting all the dough out of your mixing bowl when working with sticky doughs.
customer_reviews.author: Robert O

customer_reviews.title: if you cook you need this knife
customer_reviews.text: I watch cooking shows, yes I am an addict and I saw this style of knife and instantly wanted one. The price was perfect, the blade sharp and the precision on point. A good buy if you need one. No kitchen should be without.
customer_reviews.author: World Cru

customer_reviews.title: Useful for cutting dough
customer_reviews.text: I didn't know how much I was missing until I got this tool. Useful for cutting dough, scraping surfaces clean, smoothing frosting, straightening cake sides, etc. The bowl scraper is great as well and really gets every last bit of frosting out of bowls. I also love that it has a helpful measuring and weighing chart for quick reference.
customer_reviews.author: littleredhairedgirl

customer_reviews.title: Does it's job
customer_reviews.text: Just started baking (after receiving a Kitchen Aid stand mixer as a gift). Great for dividing the dough and cleaning off the kneading surface. Scraper does a great job of cleaning the bowl of straggling dough bits. Happy with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: latinlaw

customer_reviews.title: Great tool
customer_reviews.text: I saw a chef use a pastry scraper and decided to purchase this one. I am currently using it for my cinnamon rolls. I love the measurements on the blade that help me to cut exact size rolls. Additionally, it is great for lifting up chopped veggies to put in a bowl or pan and it makes lifting pie crust easier. It can also be used to chop.
customer_reviews.author: greene-lady

customer_reviews.title: This is the last bench scraper I will ever buy!!!
customer_reviews.text: In the past I have purchased 3 other bench scrapers. None of them have lived up to the expectations of the Spring Chef Stainless Steel Pastry/Bench Scraper. I love the feel of the scraper in my hand. It is extremely durable yet light weight. I love being able to use the Bench Scraper for tasks like chopping nuts as well as cutting dough! This is the last pastry/bench scraper I will ever need and anticipate it maintaining its like new condition for the rest of my cooking years!
customer_reviews.author: Peggy A Parmley

customer_reviews.title: Greatest!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best utensil to have when you are making bread of rolls. Slices through dough to separate into sections and then cleans your surface afterwards. I also love the bowl scraper that was included!
customer_reviews.author: CajunBear

customer_reviews.title: These are GREAT for making your home made bread
customer_reviews.text: This was a great buy for this new bread baker! both tools worked fantastically on rolls, hamburger buns and hotdog buns! The quality of these tools is evident as soon as you hold them in your hand. I am definitely pleased with my purchase and recommend them highly.
customer_reviews.author: MEB

customer_reviews.title: Love these scrapers!
customer_reviews.text: I received both scrapers and love them. I baked French bread which has a semi sticky dough. Cleaning the bowl out was a breeze with the bench scraper and cutting the dough into the perfect sizes without overworking the dough was great with the stainless steel scraper. I used the grid on the blade to measure the size I wanted and loved it. This will be a handy tool in my kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: JoAnn

customer_reviews.title: Great Bowl Scraper
customer_reviews.text: At first glance, I didn't think I'd like the silicon scraper (I ordered this set for the steel scraper). Now it's the only one I use for cleaning the sides of my bowls. Firm in the center and flexible around the edges. Will buy another and would recommend to others.
customer_reviews.author: cappy102

customer_reviews.title: My favorite scraper
customer_reviews.text: I really like the feel and sturdiness of this scraper. It’s taller than others I have which makes it easier to cut dough without hitting the dough with my knuckles. This is the one I always use now. The bowl scraper is a nice plus.
customer_reviews.author: RJP

customer_reviews.title: Good tool for baking
customer_reviews.text: I found this cutter and have used it as dough cutter and bench scraper. It pretty good and has weights and measure conversion which always comes handy. I would recommend and customer service is good.
customer_reviews.author: Yvo Eduardo Avilez Cerna

customer_reviews.title: Durable and useful
customer_reviews.text: I've used this product on a few breads that I've made, and they have made my bread making much easier. I had been using my hands to scrape the bowl for any dough, but it always strung my dough out. Now I'm able to get much more dough out, incorporate it into the rest of the dough, and divide it on my bench much more easily. While they are simple tools, I highly recommend reading the "How-to" guide. I plan on keeping these products for a long time and want to keep them in good working condition for as long as possible.
customer_reviews.author: John R.

customer_reviews.title: Great for scooping up vegetables to put in a pot ...
customer_reviews.text: Great for scooping up vegetables to put in a pot and for getting all the batter out of the bowl. Very happy with my purchase, definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Maria S.

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and very useful
customer_reviews.text: Bench knife and dough scraper is so helpful when working with bread dough. Having these tools makes baking more enjoyable. The bench knife makes cleaning a counter with flour and dried dough easy too. These are basic but necessary tools for baking. Wished I didn’t wait so long to buy them!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product and personalized customer service
customer_reviews.text: My stainless steel scraper/chopper and silicone bowl scraper arrived on time and I love them. They have helped me make Italian and sour dough so far and will be with me for many more I'm sure. They fit my hand perfectly and the bowl scraper makes it so much easier to work with a soft dough. The scraper/chopper is perfect for dividing and lifting the dough. I look forward to trying the other uses you suggested in the PDF you sent me about it. Thanks for you attention to customer service. I'm sure I will be looking for other tools and I will look to you first.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Must have in any kitchen
customer_reviews.text: Love these two items.. I make rice crispie treats and brownies alot and the bench scraper is great for measuring and cutting.. the bowl scrapper works great for pans and plates too
customer_reviews.author: ladydragon

customer_reviews.title: Great quality at a great price
customer_reviews.text: This pastry scraper is the perfect kitchen tool that I didn't think I needed until I watched two cooking demos. Both home cooks used it to scrape things up from the cutting board and transfer much more easily than I ever did with a knife blade. I haven't even used it for pastry yet but am super happy with it. The bonus scraper is also a nice touch I wasn't even looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Sheila

customer_reviews.title: Very useful kitchen gadget
customer_reviews.text: I use this every day for something. I particulary like it for using to scoop up chopped items from my cutting board to put into stews, etc. l have used it to cut pizza and to divide dough. I love kitchen gadgets and this is a very handy one. I haven't used the extra scraper much as I prefer the ones I have with handles.
customer_reviews.author: Blue DragonflyTop Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality and very useful, sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Excellent for breadmaking, sturdy and has a beveled edge to easily scrap the work surface. The bonus bowl scraper is well-designed to fit the curvature if nearly all bowls. Glad I bought this one!
customer_reviews.author: Skash00n

customer_reviews.title: Pretty useful
customer_reviews.text: I actually bought this to scrap my pizza stone! It works great for that... I've also used it in the garage to scrape wax off a butcher block... works great for that too. Who knows, maybe someday I'll 'Binging with Babish' and actually use it for dough!
customer_reviews.author: Saltydog

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: The pastry scraper was just what I wanted, but the surprise was how useful the silicon bowl scraper is. I use it in place of a spatula to get batter out of bowls. It fits my hand better and, consequently, does a better job. It has a much more natural feel than a scraper on a stick, which is what a spatula is, and I can direct it with perfect aim, plus it's wider than a spatula.
customer_reviews.author: MElias

customer_reviews.title: Feels good in the hand
customer_reviews.text: Wow, for $10 I did not expect such a high quality dough scraper. It feels heavy duty and scrapes everything off of my counter nicely. Easy to clean. The bowl scraper is a wonderful added bonus It’s so good it even got dried super glue easier off my counter. I couldn’t believe it
customer_reviews.author: Chris Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Excellent tool for the baker
customer_reviews.text: I love this tool. I haven't s raped any pastry yet, but I find them perfect for cutting cake, brownies, or bar cookies in the pan. Much better than a knife.
customer_reviews.author: keeptherepublic

customer_reviews.title: Should have owned one years ago
customer_reviews.text: Used one in cooking Class and had to own one. This is perfect because it’s sharp and sturdy. The little scraper thing is nice though I don’t utilize it as I could.
customer_reviews.author: Darlene M. Schueler

customer_reviews.title: No safety on blade
customer_reviews.text: I think it’s pathetic and very unsafe to not include a blade cover of some sort. I mean how much would it cost to add a rubber piece that would enclose the tip of sharp blade. This alone makes this company questionable.
customer_reviews.author: Dave Karl

customer_reviews.title: High Quality
customer_reviews.text: Nice thickness, and has a tapered edge making it easy to push cut veggies onto the plate. Sharp enough to cut through doe and could actually chop some things. The edge is not too sharp though... just right. Pleased with the rounded spatula which is also nicely weighted.
customer_reviews.author: Gary in San Diego

customer_reviews.title: Works great for its intended purpose
customer_reviews.text: Works great for its intended purpose. Looks nice and durable and is easy to clean. Very personal service from the seller, including a personal follow-up email after delivery to make sure the product arrived as expected and that there were no problems. Follow-up email even included tips for use and a recipe.
customer_reviews.author: Florence Knight

customer_reviews.title: but more importantly the follow up from the ‘owner ‘ making sure I was completely satisfied with my purchase
customer_reviews.text: I was unfamiliar with this small business ‘ merchandise. After seeing the items purchased I became very impressed. Items are top quality, impressive packaging, but more importantly the follow up from the ‘owner ‘ making sure I was completely satisfied with my purchase!!!! And I most definitely am!!! Great products
customer_reviews.author: fran m

customer_reviews.title: Scrapers and Cutters Excellent
customer_reviews.text: The product was exactly what I wanted. I have not been able to use it yet, but will be making bread today. I am satisfied with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Norton

customer_reviews.title: Way better on my knives because I am not scraping my ...
customer_reviews.text: Very very handy..... I wish I had purchased much sooner than I did. Way better on my knives because I am not scraping my blades along the board to pick up my food.
customer_reviews.author: ARM-C

customer_reviews.title: Love this scraper.
customer_reviews.text: Love this scraper. It fits my hand comfortably and is super easy to use. It's obviously great when working with dough, but I also use it a lot to transfer chopped items to the pan i.e. lifting chopped onions, celery, herbs etc. Very helpful and useful addition to the kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is fantastic! Just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: This is fantastic! Just what I needed. The scraper is so cute and works great. It also has a very handy metric converter printed on it for those Euro- recipes that use metric. The blade has a ruler edge which is so handy for baguettes etc. I look forward to buying more products from Spring Chef, they reached out to me personally to see if I was satisfied! 2 thumbs up here!! 👍🏻👍🏻
customer_reviews.author: emily brinjak

customer_reviews.title: Bought for daughter, she loves it
customer_reviews.text: As promised. Great scraper and I use mine to chop raw bacon or onions etc. My daughter uses it for pastries as well. Recommend.
customer_reviews.author: terandjen

customer_reviews.title: good cutter
customer_reviews.text: This cutter and scraper are good quality and well made. I am using the cutter for soap. I needed a cutter taller than 3" and this one is 4" and works perfectly for cutting my homemade soap.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Tols!
customer_reviews.text: Great Tools! I had never used this kind of tool before buying these. They make the cleanup of dough making so much easier.
customer_reviews.author: grgstrr

customer_reviews.title: Every kitchen should have one
customer_reviews.text: Even if you don't bake, this bench scraper is perfect for helping you pick up chopped food. No more making your knives dull! For dough, it's a dream tool. I've tried making bread without a bench scraper and it's not much fun. The bowl scraper is large, sturdy and works perfectly. Both items are easy to use, and very easy to clean. Great products!
customer_reviews.author: DMLA

customer_reviews.title: Bench scrapper
customer_reviews.text: Just received this, have not used it but it is very sturdy and has good weight to it. Can't wait to use it.
customer_reviews.author: kathi maroney

customer_reviews.title: Pastry scraper for bread
customer_reviews.text: This metal scraper is very sturdy and good at scraping sourdough bread dough off the counter, cutting pastries, etc. Highly recommend the set.
customer_reviews.author: arabenmom

customer_reviews.title: Better than plastic
customer_reviews.text: The material of the Bowl scraper was a lot better than I expected it to be. I expected it to be just a thin piece of plastic but it has more heft to it than that and a little bit of rubber properties that'll help you to scrape the sides of the bowl better, it was just a really good deal.
customer_reviews.author: HiottHouse

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy kitchen implement
customer_reviews.text: Great addition to my kitchen; sharp enough but not too sharp. Enables my young granddaughters to help chop soft veggies and not cut themselves. Primary purpose is in breadmaking - works great!
customer_reviews.author: Burnhaven

customer_reviews.title: Work, work, work.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to clean. After a few uses the holder get a little wiggly, just a bit. I think because we use it non stop for the past 2 months. So far my baker is happy. Which makes me happy.
customer_reviews.author: Mayra A. Ordoñez

customer_reviews.title: Impressive comfort & control
customer_reviews.text: I love the heftiness of the scraper blade, feels comfortable in your hand with precise cutting. I just got it but I did cut some holiday fudge and the squares were perfect! I’m an avid baker and I know I will love this for bread baking and cutting bar desserts in perfect pieces.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Smelser

customer_reviews.title: Necessity baking bread
customer_reviews.text: Both piece very handy for bread making, especially the bowl scraper. Metal bench scraper useful when cleaning up.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Required in the kitchen
customer_reviews.text: The first time a bench scraper you immediately wish you had bought one earlier. This particular scraper is a quality product at a great price (even without the extra scooper.)
customer_reviews.author: TCINT

customer_reviews.title: Nice size
customer_reviews.text: Bench scrape is great I use it primarily to clear my butcher block I do wish the handle was more substantial
customer_reviews.author: Doc

customer_reviews.title: Excellent high quality!
customer_reviews.text: This chopper and scraper are excellent! Solid construction built to last. You won't be buying one of these again for a very long time. I especially like the conversion table on the scraper. Very handy! Next time I need something for the kitchen, Spring Chef is my first stop,
customer_reviews.author: Victory

customer_reviews.title: Of course I needed another kitchen tool!
customer_reviews.text: This was a replacement for one that went to work in an art project. Flexible, easy-to-use & clean.
customer_reviews.author: L. Browning-Towns

customer_reviews.title: Hand wash
customer_reviews.text: I haven't used the chopper yet but I love the scraper. It's perfect and clean-up is a cinch easy just wipe it off!
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous Reid

customer_reviews.title: Stainless steel makes it easy to clean.
customer_reviews.text: This product is comfortable to hold, easy to clean, and even can be used as a measuring device. I've just begun to experiment with sour dough bread making and these two tools are very handy.
customer_reviews.author: Annie E. Schavelin

customer_reviews.title: I really like it. It cuts bread dough and/or scrapes up ...
customer_reviews.text: I had needed one of these scrapers for sometime. I really like it. It cuts bread dough and/or scrapes up cut up vegs without a problem.
customer_reviews.author: abbydog

customer_reviews.title: I use them each time I make dough
customer_reviews.text: The chopper I use to separate my dough and the scraper is used each time I remove dough out of my mixing bowl.
customer_reviews.author: Thngamajg

customer_reviews.title: Useful
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, versatile. Be careful edge of scraper is very sharp. I also use it to cut and serve Pizza.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pastry scraper.
customer_reviews.text: Works great! very strong and easy to clean! Keep on counter because I use it frequently. Rinses clean easily. Haven't used the batter scraper. didn't order this, it just came with the scraper.
customer_reviews.author: Marie

customer_reviews.title: gift
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for my neighbor. I have not used it. It arrived timely end in good order and it looks like what I wanted it to look like
customer_reviews.author: Prairie Hen

customer_reviews.title: Hey, it's a pastry scraper that works!
customer_reviews.text: A simple tool that works as good as some costing much more. I like the handle, fits my hand well and is thin enough to get a good angle on the cutting board. The curved tool works well in my pyrex bowls, too.
customer_reviews.author: Larry

customer_reviews.title: I love it
customer_reviews.text: I used my pastry scraper yesterday. It is lightweight and sharp enough to cut pie dough cleanly. It is easy to clean and easy to store. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne Franck

customer_reviews.title: I needed this
customer_reviews.text: My bread had never come out so beautiful. I no longer have excess dough in my counters. Also great for scraping herbs and veggies from my cutting boards. Stainless steel means it's forever!
customer_reviews.author: AYonko

customer_reviews.title: It is what it says
customer_reviews.text: I bake bread. This scraper is great for handling wet dough and cleaning up my wooden cutting board afterwards. The bowl scraper that comes with it works well for helping wet dough out of proofing bowls.
customer_reviews.author: Cecily Feudo

customer_reviews.title: Didn't know I needed this!
customer_reviews.text: So many uses I've already found from cutting hard butter, cream cheese, regular block cheese to using as a tool to scrape items off a cutting board. Built to last.
customer_reviews.author: Gibby

customer_reviews.title: So handy, works great, and the measurements on the one are a bonus!
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking for a kidney-bean-shaped scrapper for a long time. Finally found it on Amazon! Very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara W.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect - exactly what I need in a bench scraper
customer_reviews.text: Had been putting up with my parents' spatula as a bench scraper-knockoff for too long, I got fed up, bit the bullet and bought this bench scraper. It's fantastic; nice big size compared to others I've seen. Very sturdy and well-built and super easy to clean. The extra dough scraper/unit guide that comes with it is really nice too.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!!
customer_reviews.text: This is so nice!! I’m glad I bought this! I’m new at baking cakes and it helps make the frosting on the cake so smooth!

customer_reviews.title: Great product that is well made and is sold at an excellent price
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product that is well made and is sold at an excellent price. The sellers were prompt and courteous throughout this transaction. ***** Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Scott S.

customer_reviews.title: Durable and sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: I really like this bench scraper. It is sturdy and of good construction. I haven’t needed to use the bowl scraper yet but both items look like they will be very durable.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use lots of uses
customer_reviews.text: I use this for dividing my dough. Works well for picking up chopped veggies off cutting board. Great to scrape dough off board.

customer_reviews.title: Great Product - Good Price - Better than expected
customer_reviews.text: Does exactly what we needed it to do and that is good. Measurement table an added bonus.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy McElwee

customer_reviews.title: I love the weight of it and will also like it ...
customer_reviews.text: This is just what I was wanting for a bench scrapper for picking up vegetables after chopping. I love the weight of it and will also like it for cutting dough. The smaller piece that has the measures printed on it is very hand. I am very happy with this purchase.

customer_reviews.title: really nice!

customer_reviews.text: I was looking all over for one of these in the stores near me. So glad I decided to go to the internet and found this scrapper. It makes working with the dough for my bread and pasta so much easier. Great product. Solid weight.

product_meta.title: Spring Chef Stainless Steel Pastry Scraper/Bench Scraper Chopper, Best as Pizza and Dough Cutter
feature_bullets: GREAT FOR MORE THAN JUST SCRAPING DOUGH: Use it to gently chop soft fruits and veggies, avocados, cut even brownies, cut dough for pastries/cinnamon rolls/dinner rolls/pizza/pasta and cookies, scoop up chopped vegetables or herbs to transfer to a pot, clean counters of crumbs and dried dough, smooth out frosting on cakes or use as a mini cake lifter. Lift pie dough, chop nuts, mash cooked beans or hard boiled eggs, temper chocolate, chop grilled chicken, divvy up butter and much more!
STANDS THE TEST OF TIME: Stainless Steel blade is firm and not flimsy. It is sharp enough to cut through chilled pastry scraper dough easily and backed by our Lifetime Warranty.

TIME SAVER - No sticking means less frustration and faster work so you can get to the fun part of enjoying your food sooner. Plus handy measurement markings up to 6 inches lets you easily check the size of your rolled-out crust or make uniform sized pastries. Precise dough cutting is now easier than ever.

STURDY AND SOLID FOR YOUR BAKING NEEDS: Lets you avoid over handling dough and prevents dough from becoming tough. This bench knife can unstick dough from a surface, divide dough and scrape clean a work surface or rolling pin - or even transfer chopped foods from a cutting board to a bowl or pan.

BONUS BOWL SCRAPER - Get every last bit of dough or batter from your bowl with the handy included bowl scraper. Also has a convenient measurement conversion chart printed on the surface for quick reference any time. Scrape flat surfaces with the dough scraper and scrape curved surfaces with the bonus bowl scraper. This dymanic duo will soon become an essential part of your kitchen.
